definition: lit. sth hits one in the face/directly in one's face/sth assaults the senses/blatant (advertising)/eye-catching/(a smell) assaults the nostrils
to throw oneself at/to pounce on/to devote one's energies/to flap/to flutter/to dab/to pat/to bend over
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: The acrid smell of lamb kebabs and the sweet smell of cakes soaked in honey reign over everything else.
sentences.chinese: 烤羊肉串的辛香和蜜制蛋糕的甜香撲面而來。

sentences.english: Early in the morning when the sliding window, there is the smell of rain, but the thick autumn is coming.
sentences.chinese: 晨起推窗，還有雨的氣息，但那濃濃的秋涼撲面而來。

sentences.english: The Resting Area for Guests are redecorated in a festival atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 來賓休息區裝點一新，撲面而來的喜悅氛圍。

sentences.english: Our society is developing rapidly, economy based knowledge and society of information is coming.
sentences.chinese: 人類社會迅猛發展，知識經濟和信息化社會撲面而來。

sentences.english: Open the lid, an intense gasoline blowing.
sentences.chinese: 打開壺蓋，一股濃烈的汽油味撲面而來。

sentences.english: Opened the window, rushing toward us is a light rain started falling day.
sentences.chinese: 推開窗，撲面而來的是一個細雨霏霏的日子。

sentences.english: As soon as I walked outside, I was greeted with white shimmering blanket of cold.
sentences.chinese: 剛出門，撲面而來的是一片晶瑩雪白的冰冷。

sentences.english: I was greeted with the shimmering white blanket of cold.
sentences.chinese: 撲面而來的是一大片晶瑩雪白的冰涼。

sentences.english: The acrid smell of lamb kebabs and the sweet smell of cakes soggy in honey predominate over everything else.
sentences.chinese: 烤羊肉串的辛香和蜜制蛋糕的甜香撲面而來。

sentences.english: A sense of satire is strongly felt.
sentences.chinese: 強烈的諷刺味道撲面而來。

sentences.english: The sights and sounds of summer suburbia assaulted me.
sentences.chinese: 夏日郊區的景緻與聲音撲面而來。

sentences.english: The odor of hot pavement and auto exhaust blew into thecar.
sentences.chinese: 路面蒸騰的熱浪混合着汽車尾氣撲面而來。

sentences.english: Just walk to the stone house entrance, a water vapor that mixed medicine joss-stick rushes toward noodles since then.
sentences.chinese: 才走到石室入口，一股混合了藥香的水汽撲面而來。

sentences.english: When the door was open,a musty smell came from the room.
sentences.chinese: 打開門，一股黴味撲面而來。
